title: Timelord2067
author: Timelord2067
content: Any interest? McDonald's Monopoly peel and win stickers.Just seeing if anyone is interested in obtaining McDonald's Monopoly peel to play stickers from Australia?The promotion began on the 31st August and runs until the 23rd of October.Up for grabs are Chance Card, Instant Win, some properties.Prices?  Am thinking either auction plus BIN or, some auction some BIN only.Codes sent via https://privnote.com/ to ensure privacy.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: Timelord2067 on September 07, 2022, 02:57:16 AMAny interest? McDonald's Monopoly peel and win stickers.Just seeing if anyone is interested in obtaining McDonald's Monopoly peel to play stickers from Australia?The promotion began on the 31st August and runs until the 23rd of October.Up for grabs are Chance Card, Instant Win, some properties.Prices?  Am thinking either auction plus BIN or, some auction some BIN only.Codes sent via https://privnote.com/ to ensure privacy.I didn't know they still did this.  Do they still do this in the United States or was that practice ended when the massive scam came to light?  For anyone who isn't aware of the McDonalds employee that finessed the system and used the program to steal millions, it's a great story.  I believe there is even a Netflix documentary about it that's worth the watch (I think I saw it on Netflix).  I'm a bit surprised they still do this, but maybe their international standards are a bit more strict.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on September 08, 2022, 06:28:32 PMI didn't know they still did this.  Do they still do this in the United States or was that practice ended when the massive scam came to light?  For anyone who isn't aware of the McDonalds employee that finessed the system and used the program to steal millions, it's a great story.  I believe there is even a Netflix documentary about it that's worth the watch (I think I saw it on Netflix).  I'm a bit surprised they still do this, but maybe their international standards are a bit more strict.Yeh, it's still a thing here in Australia.  I've heard of the documentary, but haven't seen it.  The codes look to be printed on separately from the rest of the coupon - am uncertain what printing process is used (but I have a vague idea the scam was done at the printers, not on the shop floor)So far I've collected instant wins, chance and property cards if anyone's interested?

comments.author: aoluain
comments.body: Just heard an advert here in Ireland on the radio for this, they are marketing itas "PEELY PEELY" !I havent been to McDonalds in over a year but this could kind of incentivise me to make a few visitsprovided there are actual prizes  to be won but yea I'm sure a rerun of the scandal is not going to happen.https://www.joe.ie/life-style/monopoly-mcdonalds-ireland-662004Quote    Instant Win: Peel and reveal one of millions of prizes up for grabs instantly    Collect to Win: Collect and complete property sets to win amazing prizes e.g. collecting all three green properties (Grafton Street, Wicklow Street and George’s Street) wins €5,000 in cashI would say the games are specific to each country, with landmarks relevant to placed there.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Most Monopoly games sold in Australia contain the English board (but use dollars, not pounds) and the McDonald's properties are also their English namesakes from Old Kent Road to Mayfair.

comments.author: Stakefast
comments.body: I heard from some sources that these kind of monopoly stickers are sometimes fake. Be very careful using or buying any of these.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Quote from: Stakefast on September 19, 2022, 11:00:01 AMI heard from some sources that these kind of monopoly stickers are sometimes fake. Good call - (then again, judging by your recent post history, you make such bogus claims in just about every post you make to make your post count for the signature campaign you are in) please share the link where you read this.QuoteBe very careful using or buying any of these.Any person purchasing any code has the option of paying an additional fee to have the actual coupon posted to them.All property codes/coupons will be posted to the buyer upon receipt of their mailing details they send to me via https://privnote.com/ to ensure privacy.
